attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support our “non-racist”, “non-rapist”, “non-islamaphobic”, “non-xenophobic”, “non-transphobic”, “women loving” president 😺💖 But it turns out that my fishes big toe hurts because of all the information given out on this app. You tried!😉🧚🏻‍♂️ and now pls for the love of god never try it again💖😾🤓
attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE👎🏻😾

attributes.review: This is the worst app I have ever downloaded. It is very glitchy and took days to download. It kept making my phone freeze and didn’t let me open other apps for days. Please take this app down, it damaged my phone❤️

app is quite horrible to say the least. i downloaded it in support of my amazing, non-racist, non-homophobic, non-predatory president. and to say the least..i was unimpressed. once it downloaded, after several days, it put a bug on my phone. and now i can’t turn up my volume and to be quite frank i think he’s hacked into my camera. i’m nervous, and i don’t know if i’m being spied on. anywho, the app didn’t meet my expectations and i am very disappointed.
attributes.title: very sad 🥰🧚💗

attributes.review: It was sooo horrible. First it took all of my data and made my phone glitch really bad. Second the app was laggy and it took all of my private info. It got access to everything I had even tho I didn’t let it do that. DONT DOWNLOAD THAT APP YOU WILL REGERT IT.
attributes.title: Took all my data

attributes.review: Terrible app! It took 2 weeks to download and when it finally did I went to access it and in doing so it locked me out of my phone! I had to restart my phone in order to be able to use it again! DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!
attributes.title: DONT USE

attributes.review: This app was ridiculously easy to hack. It took me less than two hours to access other users information so I’ll be selling some phone numbers online
attributes.title: Several Security Flaws

attributes.review: after i downloaded this horrific app that took hours to download my phone keeps tweaking. the app will open and my phone will shut off completely and reset. i will never recommend this app to anyone ever
attributes.title: WORST  APP

attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded this my sleep paralysis demon came back but this time in the form of Trumpy and he won’t go away. The walls bleed orange. I always hear “fake news” before I even say anything. I find hairballs all over the house. This app is cursed.
attributes.title: Don’t get it!!

attributes.review: I hate this app man  it took 2 months to download and when it finished all of the stuff in my house started floating so I called trump but he no answer😫🤬😡🦵🏿then the day after that i was XUE👣HUA💪🏿PIAO👺PIAO👹BEING🤥FUNG😳XIAO🦧XIAO🐡so I had too ûñįńßtæł the äpq but then my hämßtęr ran away so I had to chase him with my mūšrtærd I caught him tho thanks trümp🤬🦧😫👣👣😫🦵🏿😂👩🏿‍🦳👾💩💩👿😫👹😎💩👹😎😎
attributes.title: Trash

attributes.review: This app took way too long to download... After it finally downloaded, I opened up the app and my phone completely crashed. I restarted my phone and came to realize I had been hacked. Fix this app and the person it idolizes.🤮
attributes.title: ABSOLUTE GARBAGE
